kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.msg: On constate bien que "//nav[@id="nav-main" and @class="nav-main"]" est bien visible.
kw.arg: On constate bien que "${Barre_de_nav}" est bien visible.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Wait For Condition
kw.doc: Waits until ``condition`` is true or ``timeout`` expires.
